name: Emergency Service

description: We provide. ICU Ambulance Service, Ac ambulance, freezing ambulance. Best Ambulance Service, Competitive Pricing, No Hidden Charge Call Us for Ambulance.

name: Radiology
description: Radiology, also known as diagnostic imaging, is a series of tests that take pictures or images of parts of the body.The field encompasses two areas diagnostic radiology and interventional radiology.

name: Surgery
description: we providesupports surgical specialties. Anaesthesiology, cardiovascular surgery, ENT, general surgery, OB/GYN, orthopaedics, pathology, podiatry, radiology.

name: Expart Consultation
description: We provide discussion between you and the Consultant about your medical symptoms.you will meet with the Consultant who will look after you throughout your treatment.

name: Dental Service
description: we provide dental services to emergency department patients and inpatients when needed and provide emergent treatment indicated by oral trauma or infection
